summary:
Head of Innovation and Co-Founder of Game Plan Capital, a tech hub housing fintech, foodtech, edutech, health-tech, modern entertainment, and sports startups, with a primary goal of enhancing the world through meaningful products that positively impact our quality of life and environmental footprint.

Whenever I encounter a product with room for improvement, I perceive it as an exciting opportunity to develop a superior solution. It could involve existing solutions that lack user-friendliness or thorough consideration. You've probably come across an online service or two that frustrated you with its complexity in its simplicity, were you wonder why it doesn't enable you to do this, or that. That's where we come in. 

As the Head of Innovation and Co-founder of Game Plan Capital, my role involves challenging entrepreneurs to think outside the box and continuously innovate their products. Flawless products are rare, which is why I strive to inspire innovation. Furthermore, I proudly lead our startup TapCash and InBrands as its temporary director, a forthcoming payment solutions and and a patented NFT platform that will revolutionize marketing. 




Awards & Nominations
2021 -  "Innovation of the Year" - FIN PAY, Payment Solution
2013 -  "Hottest Digital Entrepreneur" - Nomination for VionLabs, a movie streaming service for telcos
2013 - "Golden Mobile" - Vionlabs, movie streaming services for mobile carriers
2011 -  "Best Mobile Service of the Year" - Vionlabs, a mobile streaming service for Tele2/Comviq

ICT Spring is a Global Tech Conference hosting an array of International Professionals. This two-day yearly event is held in Luxembourg City, at the heart of Europe, and offers the participants a unique opportunity to deepen their Digital Knowledge, capture the Value of the fast-growing FinTech Industry, and explore the impact of Space Technologies on Terrestrial Businesses, through exhibitions and demonstrations of the latest Tech Trends and Innovations.

https://www.ictspring.com/

awards.title: Swedens hottest digital entrepreneur 2013 utmärkelsedatum
awards.description:
Sverige är ett av världens hetaste startup städer. De goda exemplen är många - vem känner inte till framgångshistorier som Spotify, Skype och Mojang? För åttonde året i rad listar internetvärlden de människor och företag du behöver för att hålla ett öga på under det kommande året.

http://www.idg.se/2.1085/1.528659/entreprenorslistan-2013--plats-25---16?queryText=vionlabs

awards.title: Golden Mobile
awards.description: A passion for film and TV series and a sadness that the new technology made people no longer pay for them. It became the 2009 launch of VionLabs, which since then, together with operators, cable TV companies and film distributors, has adapted film and TV series offerings to the mobile and gave viewers new opportunities to interact and recommend - on all platforms.
awards.issuer: The 2013 winner of a Guldmobil for this year's mobile innovation promises this year's revolution.

awards.title: Best Mobile Movie Service
awards.description:
VionLabs got awarded as the winner with the motivation for most user friendly service with best video quality.

www.mobil.se awarded for best movie service on mobiles competing against Viaplay (Modern Times Group), High 3G access (Tre) and other movie services.

projects.title: BLOCKSWISH / World's first decentralized bank and payment services
projects.description:
Mission: Create the world's first Decentralized Bank and Payment Service
Blockswish is built upon the blockchain protocol ERC-20, to conduct save and secure payment services.

contributors.headline: Founder at Blockchain Collective | Co-Founder Game Plan Capital

projects.title: Green Food Interactive
projects.description:
Mission: Create world's first food waste application in the blockchain. 
Blockchain developed food waste application combining AI and human behaviour to significantly reduce our environmental footprint. Whereas through cryptographic verification, game-theoretic equilibrium can be created that benefits all parties in a synchronous manner from producer/manufacturer or distributor up until consumption and disposal of goods--creating an incentive system which rewards users around blockchain based incentives while accelerating sustainable improvements throughout the whole value chain down from producers who produce less environmentally damaging products towards consumers offering more options with less negative impacts on Earth's biosphere

projects.title: First Film & TV Hackathon in Sweden
projects.description:
The first Film & TV Hackathon devoted to how we discover, watch and be involved together with film. 

A community space gathering developers, designers, filmmakers and visual artists with a passion for new movie and TV experiences. A challenge beyond technology focusing only on user behavior. An exciting journey through fantasy and reality, using technology as the only tool to realize a unique experience. Teama will create innovations leading the future of film consumption.

projects.title: Film i mobilen "Movie Phone" for Tele2 Sweden
projects.description:
Mission: Create the World's first Mobile Movie Streaming Service
Watch movies on your mobile, tablet, PC, Smart TV, STB or wherever you are! With Tele2's movie service, say goodbye to boring travel or waiting. Get full access to all video stores in one interface offering over 8000 movies and 20 stores. Buy, rent or subscribe easily by downloading the service from Android Market or App stores. 

The service was launched in 2009 in Sweden as "Film i Mobilen" and awarded several times, "Guldmobilen" (Golden Mobile) as well as the team behind it nominated amongst the 25 hottest entrepreneurs in Sweden.

projects.title: Social Mobile Cloud
projects.description: Social and content related applications to enrich a two-way communication, connected with friends trough different channels making the experience unique and engaging for the user.

projects.title: Tele2 Music Unlimited
projects.description: We created a streaming radio service with 30-40 radio channels enabling users create playlists and share with friends. A mobile focused solution and a very successful service with more than 200 000 subscribers.

profile_positions.description:
InBrands pioneers the entertainment industry with the worlds first patented blockchain platform for NFT use connecting brands with movies, and people with the brands. 

InBrands strives to enhance user experience and create added value through strategic product placement in the entertainment industry. By providing exceptional opportunities for brands to develop distinctive digital products, they establish strong connections with audiences while ensuring security through smart contracts. With their groundbreaking patent, InBrands solidifies their position as industry leaders by enabling seamless collaboration between content producers and brands, ultimately generating new income streams for creators worldwide.


Coming soon on..
www.inbrands.io
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Game Plan Capital, a hybrid tech hub housing fintech, foodtech, edutech, health-tech, modern entertainment, and sports startups. We match investors with projects, and startups with people. 

"Blockchain is paving the way for a lifestyle revolution, where technologies merge seamlessly." 

Every day, we strive to embrace challenges and identify opportunities that unleash boundless potential. We meticulously bring attention to overlooked areas, uncovering hidden possibilities, and continuously innovate through revolutionary tech solutions.

We specialize in fostering the growth of innovative businesses across a wide range of cutting-edge sectors, including fintech, foodtech, modern entertainment and more. Our extensive portfolio encompasses financial services, online education, e-sports entertainment, as well as metaverse and VR platforms. We also engage in programmatic scarcity projects and tokenized fractional ownership initiatives, all powered by blockchain-based incentive systems.

We are a group of tech-savvy visionaries who dare to challenge the established norms. Our unwavering belief lies in harnessing the power of blockchain and smart contracts as groundbreaking protocols. They empower secure data exchange across diverse locations, with the robust foundation of web3 technology.

Our firm upholds the value of fostering innovation and empowering ambitious entrepreneurs with the essential resources they need to achieve their goals of success.

www.gameplan.capital

profile_positions.description: New Motor Media N.V. is an internet based business engaged in motorsports entertainment, gaming and social media. In addition, the Company is also engaged in the market development of electric mobility products, electronic sports technology. AR, AI, UX, UI, Sports management, Gamification, Screening social media and PR with Headquartered in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, the company has recently opened an administrative, marketing and UX development office in Stockholm, Sweden.
profile_positions.title: VP & Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
Ready to take motorsport into the modern age? Come join us and push it to new heights! Our experienced team provides a comprehensive range of services from custom leagues, game product placement, global promotion management and state-of-the art simulators. With our support we'll help you gain traction; become immersed in virtual racing with powerful communities growing around your brand. Let's together revolutionize motor sports competition - buckle up now for an epic ride ahead!

Car companies now have a unique opportunity to break into the exciting world of esports. Through global competitions that can be held at some of the biggest race tracks and cities around, consumers get a chance to dive head-first into captivating AR/VR experiences with real implications for achieving pro level competition across categories like driving, SIM racing and Electronic Arts. Now is your brand's moment in time to take its engagement worldwide through an electrifying gaming technology!
profile_positions.title: CEO & co-founder | Head of Esport Business Development

profile_positions.description:
As FIN-PAY Europe and the UK Director, I take on the captivating challenge of building infrastructure; recruiting ambitious teams from around Europe and beyond. Constantly juggling multiple time zones across different cultures to keep stakeholders satisfied in an ever-changing workflow is no mean feat! Yet with a sound understanding of global markets, solid project management skills - this role promises awe inspiring rewards for those ready to step up.

FIN-PAY is changing the game. Our patented solution offers an innovative, unified payment network to merchants around the globe that revolutionizes payments with no hidden fees or frictions - regardless of methods and currencies! From one single application we can provide access for 4 billion consumers in a way never before seen. Chosen as Innovation of The Year 2021, FIN-PAY's ultimate payment solution will make transactions simpler than ever!

Features
In-Person Payments - SoftPOS solution, Omni-Channel Onboarding, Payment Aggregation, Digital Card Issuance, Everyday business purchase and Buy Now Pay Later Business Purchase, withholding over 40 integration and security certificates for you to stay ahead of your game. 

www.FinPay.co

profile_positions.title: Founder | Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
Introducing accredited courses to the European market with a focus on the Nordic countries.  The Blockchain Collective was the first in the world to offer accredited courses by the Australian Government.  As amazing as this technology is, it's important to understand the business side and the opportunities it offers when the internet is about to upgrade into web3 format. 

About 
Blockchain Collective is a leading blockchain education body empowering enterprise, educators and students for a future in blockchain and distributed ledger technologies.
We aim to service the growing demand for qualified and skilled people in the application of blockchain, worldwide.
Our education is aligned to meet industry's need of understanding the strategic approach to applying blockchain and DLT to new and existing businesses.

profile_positions.description:
Our ambition is to make the world more prosperous and rewarding for everyone. We believe that technologies such as blockchain hold great potential - their mathematical properties help establish sustainable connections with people all around the globe, while automated systems integrate into lives of individuals everywhere regardless of geographical location or background.

World Cryptonomic Foundation is bridging the gap between people, organizations, and governments to make blockchain technology accessible for everyone. Through our open forum we impart knowledge on cryptocurrencies and digital assets so that even those unfamiliar with this innovative tech can educate themselves; empowering investors all the way down through everyday users! Join us in revolutionizing how business works today - Welcome to World Cryptonomic Foundation.

profile_positions.title: Founder | Food Supply on Blockchain

profile_positions.description:
In 2006, the world was abuzz with innovative ideas for mobile technology. Nokia led the revolution while Samsung and Sony Ericsson continued to build their legacy in this rapidly-changing field. Unsurprisingly, Facebook's exponential growth gained everyone’s attention as they found themselves increasingly attached to small handheld screens! 

In Sweden however, three tech savvy entrepreneurs had a different vision - one that extended beyond simply listening music; if only you could watch movies directly from your phone? This was THE spark of inspiration needed – allowing these Swedish innovators to create something truly cool!!

Arash Pendari, Christer Hernestig and Maddox-Rudolf Burhall had extensive knowledge in game development, streaming services and mobile marketing - all they needed was the resources to make their dream come true! 

From Stockholm’s southern suburbs the trio took up an ambitious challenge: create Mobile TV with such cutting edge technology it would revolutionize content consumption for years to come. In 2007 this revolutionary concept finally became reality, and becoming the worlds first service to stream movies to mobile devices. Whilst Netflix had just began offering subscribers the option to stream directly to their homes through the internet, these entrepreneurs were three steps ahead and launched "Film i Mobilen" for the Swedish telco Tele2/Comviq in 2009. 

Despite having small screens with low resolution - those early entrepreneurs embraced headphones as primary accessories and; ingeniously devised surround sound technologies that provided users exceptional entertainment experiences. The first iPhone came later that year – changing our lives as we know it today!
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder | Vionlabs

profile_positions.description: Have you got what it takes to revolutionize the world of film? The first ever Film & TV Hackathon is here and ready for tech pioneers, developers and creatives who want to challenge themselves in pushing boundaries. Europe's Swedish hub has set out a mission: harness technology, multimedia expertise and data with one ultimate goal-improvements on movie experiences that make discovery, watching or engaging much easier! How will you use your skillset (in limited hours) within apps or other technical solutions to create an inspiring breakthrough in reinventing television viewing as we know it?
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder | Hackathon Master
